Cranston.WHJJ: WHJJ (920 AM / 104.7 FM / 93.3 WSNE-HD3, "News Radio 920") is a radio station in Providence, Rhode Island. The station was previously assigned the call sign WJAR, adopting its current callsign on November 26, 1980 when previous owner Outlet Communications sold the station and retained the heritage call letters for their television station on channel 10. Its studios are on 75 Oxford Street in Providence, while its transmitter tower is in Riverside, Rhode Island.
